report.title: Species & occurrence counts by user
report.description: Lists users and the number of species and occurrences entered by each of them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN users u on u.id=o.created_by_id and u.id<>1 JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: website_exclusions
param.display: List of website IDs to exclude
param.description: Because some website owners don't like league tables, this allows them to be excluded by providing a comma separated list of IDs

param.name: user_exclusions
param.display: List of user IDs to exclude
param.description: Allows special case user IDs to be excluded by providing a comma separated list of warehouse user IDs.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating the current user.

column.name: name
column.sql: p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' or p.first_name=p.surname then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end

column.name: me
column.sql: case cast(u.id as character varying) when '#currentUser#' then 'me' else 'other' end
